item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, May 11, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How a little-known French literary critic became a bellwether for the US right
2. Three things we learned about Sam Altman by scoping his kitchen
3. China’s J-10 ‘Dragon’ shows teeth in India-Pakistan combat debut
4. [Opinion] Why can’t more financial heavyweights write letters like Warren Buffett?
5. US claims ‘substantial progress’ after two days of trade talks with China
